name: Flight Club
description:
Flight Club

Flight Club is an endless flyer inspired by Drew Scanlon's airborne escapades. Created for Giant ROM, the Giant Bomb game jam.

Objective: Avoid the obstacles and don't crash! If you do, try again for a better score!

Controls: Up & Down!

Note: You can play the game in a browser using the Unity web player. However, the game benefits from a larger screen, so for best results download the Mac or Windows version and crank up the resolution.

For very high resolution screens (>1080p), there's an option in the pause screen to turn on double scaling.
